title: Why Did The Scientist Cross The Road?...To Meet Kasha Patel!
description:
When Kasha Patel decided to try out stand-up comedy, she was told to joke about what she knew. For her, that was science. Today on Short Wave, Kasha talks to host Emily Kwong about how she developed her sense of humor, how she infuses science into her comedy and why on Earth she analyzed 500 of her jokes.

Listen to the end for bonus audio!

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Science comedian Kasha Patel talks to host Emily Kwong about how she developed her comedy and how it can help infuse science into her audience members' lives.
itunes:subtitle: Science comedian Kasha Patel talks to host Emily Kwong about how she developed her comedy and how it can help infuse science into her audience members' lives.
